    • getList

      public void getList(SaveData s, javafx.collections.ObservableList<PhotoLib> a, String username, boolean copymove, String current, int in, Photo selected)
      load user data as well as load other albums to move/copy to
      Parameters:
      s - SaveData object
      a - user data
      username - of user
      copymove - boolean to say to move or copy
      current - current album selected to move/copy from
      in - index of current user
      selected - Photo to move/copy
